data.content:
noun
plural -downs
[count] a quick report about the main parts of something
They gave us a rundown on/of the main points of the news.
Brit :a gradual reduction in the size of a business, activity, etc.
a rundown of/in our public services - see also run down at 1run
baseball :a play in which a runner is chased by two or more opposing players who throw the ball to each other in an attempt to tag the runner out
He was caught in a rundown.
